HOMEMADE
MEALS

Here at Anna Mae’s we try our best to use local food suppliers when possible. We take pride in using local growers to provide the delicious food that we serve to you, our guests.  There are many reasons to buy local. We believe that supporting our local producers is a great start to sustaining and growing our local economy. In return we are also providing you with top quality, fresh tasting food.

Please note: We are not a peanut free facility.

Try our FAMOUS Broasted Chicken!

We use FRESH marinated chicken, dusted in our special seasonings and Broasted to a crisp, golden brown
